report.title: Efforts and sightings per month for location 2.
report.description: Report designed to display all sightings and efforts for a location on a month to month basis within a year. Note that private/favourite site support is not included as it is intended that code supporting private/favourite sites prevents the user from ever seeing the page with this chart on. If you wish to extend the use of this report then private/favourite site support must be considered.
report.query: select #columns# FROM generate_series(1,12) as months(no) LEFT JOIN samples sEffort ON extract(month from sEffort.date_start) = months.no and sEffort.sample_method_id = #effort_sample_method_id# AND sEffort.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences oSighting ON extract(month from oSighting.date_start) = months.no WHERE 1=1 #filters#

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: year
param.where: extract(year from oSighting.date_start)=#year# AND extract(year from sEffort.date_start)=#year#

param.name: effort_sample_method_id
param.description: Id of the Effort Sample Method.

param.name: sighting_sample_method_id
param.description: Id of the Sighting Sample Method.
